channel.title: Playlist on MediaGlasses

item.title: Top 20ish Records of 2020
item.description: A little late, but there are my top 20 records of 2020, as per previous years these are all ones which I have purchased on vinyl. bdrmm ‎- Bedroom Doves ‎- The Universal Want Pure Reason Revolution — Eupnea Orb — Abolition Of The Royal Familia The Smashing Pumpkins — Cyr Andy Bell — The View From Halfway Down Ulver — Flowers Of Evil Church Of The Cosmic Skull — Everybodys Going To Die Jim Bob — Pop Up Jim Bob Matt Berry — Phantom Bird Working Mens Club — Working Mens Club Crippled Black Phoenix — Ellengast Bruce Springsteen — Letter To You
